ai-iti24:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti24:2.1_0: “Mendicants, one person roaming and transmigrating for an eon would amass a heap of bones the size of this Mount Vepulla, if they were gathered together and not lost.”
ai-iti24:3.3_0: so that you can stand on the rock,
ai-iti24:4.1_0: But this child of the Buddha
ai-iti24:4.2_0: whose mother is on Mount Vepulla.
ai-iti24:4.4_0: near the Mountainfold of the Magadhans.
ai-iti24:6.1_0: After roaming on seven times at most,
ai-iti24:6.3_0: They make an end of suffering
ai-iti24:6.4_0: with the ending of all fetters.
ai-iti24:7.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
